mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( sale_attr_value_id ORDER BY sav.base_sale_attr_id, skv.sale_attr_value_id SEPARATOR "|" ) AS valueIds, skv.sku_id FROM sku_sale_attr_value skv, spu_sale_attr_value sav WHERE skv.spu_id = sav.spu_id AND skv.sale_attr_value_id = sav.id AND skv.spu_id = #{spuId} GROUP BY skv.sku_id
